# Test ordering of data

```{r}
library(bayesdfa)
options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())
```


```{r}
set.seed(4442)
num_trends <- 2
num_ts <- 3
num_years <- 20
loadings_matrix <- matrix(nrow = num_ts, ncol = num_trends,
  rnorm(num_ts * num_trends, 0, 0.5))

dat <- bayesdfa:::sim_dfa(
  num_trends = num_trends,
  num_years = num_years,
  num_ts = num_ts,
  loadings_matrix = loadings_matrix,
  sigma = 0.2)

m <- fit_dfa(dat$y_sim, num_trends = num_trends, nu_fixed = 200, iter = 2000)
print(plot_trends(rotate_trends(m)))
m

m2 <- fit_dfa(dat$y_sim[c(3, 1, 2),], num_trends = num_trends, nu_fixed = 200, iter = 2000)
print(plot_trends(rotate_trends(m2)))
m2
```
